amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Defense to establish criteria for determining the types of critical information required to be made known expeditiously to senior decision makers in the Department of Defense.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 108-499 move mission critical information from the commissioning authority up to the highest levels in short order when that information portends events or situations detrimental to our strategic plan.
